We have managed to sneak into the aband.Translation: We have managed to sneak into the abandoned basements and sewers of South Metropoli

From here we should be able to reach ei.Translation: From here we should be able to reach either the financial district.

The distant sound from the underground.Translation: The distant sound from the underground trains can be heard...

RESIST! We need to cross one of the aba.Translation: RESIST! We need to cross one of the abandoned train lines to reach the power plants...

Keep it up! I can hear the door's engin.Translation: Keep it up! I can hear the door's engine moving through the wall!
